# WebContentSettings.FilterPolicy.none

**Case**

The policy doesn’t affect any domains.

## Declaration

```swift
case none
```

## Providing Filters and Exceptions

- **WebContentSettings.FilterPolicy.all(except:)**: The system blocks all websites except the ones you specify.
- **WebContentSettings.FilterPolicy.auto(_:except:)**: The system blocks adult content.
- **WebContentSettings.FilterPolicy.specific(_:)**: The policy blocks the specified domains.

items.description: The system blocks all websites except the ones you specify.
items.name: WebContentSettings.FilterPolicy.all(except:)

items.description: The policy blocks the specified domains.
